channel.title: Food and Restaurants on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Food and Restaurants on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Erewhon Takes Manhattan!
item.description: A new outpost is about to pop up in the West Village — but it’ll cost you $36,000 to walk through the door. Smoothie not included.

item.title: Erewhon Takes Manhattan!
item.description: A new outpost is about to pop up in the West Village — but it’ll cost you $36,000 to walk through the door. Smoothie not included.

item.title: Elon Musk’s Nostalgic New Tesla Diner in Hollywood Will Please Tourists, His Cultists and Trend Chasers
item.description: The throwback drive-in, conceived years ago when the world’s richest man was still a Los Angeles hometown hero, bows in a radically different era.
